creditline: Gift of Jack A. and Aviva Robinson
description: Fringe with warp-twined heading, warp-twined band, Printed cloth bands on reverse edge, No backing cloth. Pieced black wool ground with polychrome silk embroidery. The panel is edged with cotton woven tape and fringe. There is no backing. There are printed cotton bands on the edges of the reverse.
medium: Silk, wool, cotton; needle chain stitch, slanted buttonhole stitch, double chain stitch
title: Tabaklau ilgich
